channel.title: Another problem
channel.description: I start up my server and it begins to run but never finishes starting up... [IMG]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/9484/problemor.jpg[/img] Any help? :confused: Client and source: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464527.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464527.0.html[/url]

item.title: Another problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Valcorex:

Ok, The Server is listen on port 43594 but how do i know which port the client is connecting through?

Port:

I believe in client.java is default set too 43594, so search for that.

IP is in Gui.java

item.title: Another problem
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:13, topic:370007”][quote author=Valcorex link=topic=466122.msg3408920#msg3408920 date=1290531640]
It does say “Error connecting to server” but i don’t know if i have the ports correct… where do i change the port it is listening to?
[/quote]

Server.java
and server config file.

In server.java search for

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; // 43594=default [/quote]
TomScape help me look at my topic

Read full topic

item.title: Another problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Valcorex:

It does say “Error connecting to server” but i don’t know if i have the ports correct… where do i change the port it is listening to?

Server.java
and server config file.

In server.java search for

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; // 43594=default

item.title: Another problem

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Valcorex:

Ok Found out where the problem is coming from… If i change the ip back to local host it works fine but when i change it to an actual ip address it doesn’t work right…

Does it just say ‘error connecting to server’.

Make sure it’s listening on the correct port etc if so? Please provide more information.

item.title: Another problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Valcorex, post:7, topic:370007”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=466122.msg3408903#msg3408903 date=1290530761]

	public void run() {
		// setup the listener
		try {
			shutdownClientHandler = false;
			clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1,
					null);
			misc.println("..................................................");		
			misc.println(".....Starting up Project Cleanup Beta v1.0........");
			misc.println("..................................................");

edited original post, just for show. It’s ran fine.
[/quote]
Then why is it No one can log in?[/quote]

No, you probably haven’t done something correct on ‘how to make a server’. Or some other reason as stated above.

Read full topic

item.title: Another problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It’s running? I’m confused, what?

There’s nothing wrong with it, it started up fine. Yeah, it’s just for show.

	public void run() {
		// setup the listener
		try {
			shutdownClientHandler = false;
			clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1,
					null);
			misc.println("..................................................");		
			misc.println(".....Starting up Project Cleanup Beta v1.0........");
			misc.println("..................................................");

Read full topic
